sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./styles/WeekCard.css"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faCommentAlt } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; function WeekCard({ weekData }) { const { weekId, startingDate, endingDate, assignment, mentorFeedbacks, timeManagement, overallAssessment, communicationSkill, attendanceParticipation, } = weekData; return (

Week {weekId} {startingDate} - {endingDate}

{overallAssessment}
Overall Assessment
{assignment}
Assignment
{attendanceParticipation}
Attendance & Participation
{timeManagement}
Time Management
{communicationSkill}
Communication Skills
{/* */}
Mentor's Feedback

{mentorFeedbacks.join(", ")}

); } export default WeekCard;
